text: Hanna Plotitsyna in 2015 Hanna Oleksandrivna Plotitsyna () (born 1 January 1987) is a Ukrainian athlete specialising in the sprint hurdles. She represented her country at the 2013 World Championships and 2014 World Indoor Championships without qualifying to the semifinals. She has personal bests of 12.89 seconds in the 100 metres hurdles (+0.9 m/s; Kropyvnytskiy 2017) and 7.92 seconds indoors (Beograd 2017). ==Competition record== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing the |-
